name: Hotel Inverse
description:
Roam the endless hallways of musty carpets and stained walls. Change gravity at your command to avoid obstacles and gain advantages during battles. In order to progress through the hotel, you will need to search for a keycard to unlock the next elevator.  Be warned, you won't be alone in there.

Controls:
WASD - Move

QE - Rotate

R - Change Gravity

Shift + Left Click - Consume Item

Shift + Right Click - Delete Item

Made by Spicy Chicken and Pixel Overload in 7 Days for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021.
